SELECT m.id as id, m.material_name as materialName, m.deadline as deadline, m.actual_deadline as actualDeadline, m.is_all_textbook_published as isAllTextbookPublished, count(u.id) as user_num, count(u.id) as declaration_num, m.is_deleted, m.is_all_textbook_published, m.is_force_end, case when o.org_id = #{parameter.org_id} then 1 else 0 end as beenPublishTo
FROM material AS m left Join declaration AS d ON m.id = d.material_id left Join writer_user AS u ON u.id = d.user_id left join material_org o on m.id = o.material_id and o.org_id = #{parameter.org_id}
((m.is_public = '0' and o.org_id = #{parameter.org_id}) or (m.is_public = '1'))
GROUP BY m.id HAVING 1=1 and m.is_published = 1 and (m.is_deleted = 0 or m.is_deleted is null )
and m.material_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parameter.queryCon },'%')
and ( (m.is_all_textbook_published = 0 ) and m.is_force_end =0 and m.actual_deadline >= NOW() )
and ( (m.is_all_textbook_published = 1) or m.is_force_end =1 or m.actual_deadline < NOW() )
ORDER BY m.deadline ASC LIMIT ${start}, ${pageSize}

select count(*) from ( SELECT m.id FROM material AS m left Join declaration AS d ON m.id = d.material_id left join material_org o on m.id = o.material_id and o.org_id = #{parameter.org_id}
(m.is_deleted = 0 or m.is_deleted is null ) and m.is_published = 1 and((m.is_public = '0' and o.org_id = #{parameter.org_id}) or (m.is_public = '1'))
and m.material_name LIKE CONCAT('%',#{parameter.queryCon },'%')
and ( (m.is_all_textbook_published = 0 ) and m.is_force_end =0 and m.actual_deadline >= NOW() )
and ( (m.is_all_textbook_published = 1) or m.is_force_end =1 or m.actual_deadline < NOW() )
group by m.id )t
